dublin_core.dcvalue: Recent increases in demand on our service have posed challenges to the viability of our walk in sexually transmitted infection services in Leicester Areas identified as hot spots were patient waiting times result provision and staff stress levels To improve patient and staff satisfaction new technologies to facilitate communication with patients were explored and then implemented in April 2003 A summary of the data analysed for the period April 2003 June 2004 is presented including survey of the users and non users of this facility
International journal of STD And AIDS
Texting--a revolution in sexual health communication.
